list_translation_mean.translate_mean: lớp gạch để xây bờ đá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a floor or stair covering made from thick woven fabric, typically shaped to fit a particular room.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the house has wall-to-wall carpets throughout
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngôi nhà có thảm trên tường trong suốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (a floor or stairs) with a carpet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the stairs were carpeted in a lovely shade of red
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cầu thang được trải thảm trong một màu đỏ đáng yêu
